SkillTable_Clean.json.EnglishLong:
Enhanced Falcon Toss, leap into the air and gather wind power, launching a fierce wind blade spear. Deals 750% ATK as Attack Damage to all enemies in the area and significantly reduces their tenacity, growing with the upgrade/advancement of the Falcon Toss skill.
Immediately gain 3 stacks of Sharp after Casting .

Applies an acceleration effect to the caster. Increases MATK and reduces CD while active.

Tips: Cast when other skills are on CD .

SkillTable_Clean.json.ChineseShort: 奥尔维拉触发弱点攻击
SkillTable_Clean.json.AIEnglishShort: Orvilla triggers a weak point attack

SkillTable_Clean.json.ChineseShort: 奥尔维拉触发爆裂居合斩
SkillTable_Clean.json.EnglishLong: Consume all <style="accent-gn">Thunder Sigil</style> to unleash <style="accent-gn">5</style> rapid blade waves, dealing <style="magic">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">700%</style> ATK. Scales with the Level/Tier of <style="accent-gn">Special Attack</style>.

Enhanced <linktext=1501><style="ItemQuality_5">Flash strike</style></linktext>, Consume all <style="accent-gn">Thunder Sigil</style>s, then charges forward after powering up to slash all enemies in path, dealing <style="accent-gn">510%</style> ATK as <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> (which scales with the Level/Tier of <linktext=1501><style="ItemQuality_5">Flash Strike</style></linktext>). <style="accent-gn">Each</style> <style="accent-gn">Thunder Sigil</style> consumed increases DMG by <style="accent-gn">25%</style>.

Enhanced <linktext=1554><style="ItemQuality_5">Raijin Dash</style></linktext>, Consume all <style="accent-gn">Thunder Sigil</style>s to summon more ferocious lightning, dealing <style="accent-gn">450%</style> ATK as <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> (which scales with the Level/Tier of <linktext=1554><style="ItemQuality_5">Raijin Dash</style></linktext>). <style="accent-gn">Each</style> <style="accent-gn">Thunder Sigil</style> consumed increases DMG by <style="accent-gn">25%</style>.

A lightning-fast Iai Slash is executed, inflicting Attack Damage on enemies. Each strike costs 50 Blade Intent. Once Attack Speed reaches 25%|50%|90%, deals 1|2|3 additional attack(s). If Blade Intent remains after the strike, the skill can be immediately recast.

Tips: As a core skill to synergize with Moonstrike Spec, this skill primarily consumes Blade Intent to deal DMG. Execute consecutive casts when Blade Intent has reached its maximum capacity.

Consumes 40 points of Rage, violently slams down the weapon, dealing Attack Damage to surrounding enemies, and enters the Countercrush state. During this time, Block Chance +100%, Attack Damage taken from blocks -30%.

Tips: Very effective in environments with mostly Attack Damage. After casting, the block chance increases, reliably reducing Attack Damage taken.

SkillTable_Clean.json.ChineseShort: 罗特罗亚尼-弓-特殊攻击B-强化

SkillTable_Clean.json.EnglishLong: Fires a giant arrow at the target, dealing <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">1000%</style> ATK.

skill_names_Clean.json.ChineseShort: 天翔贯星击-强化怒涛射击

SkillTable_Clean.json.EnglishLong:
Let the Passion Flow Again! Consumes 5 Performance Passion, reigniting the spirits of the weary. Performs a sequence of notes that heals 10 allies.

Performance Passion: Required to perform music. Regenerates 1 stack every 5s.

Tips: Highest healing potential. Monitor team health to avoid overhealing.

skill_names_Clean.json.AIEnglishShort: Upgrade and explode the entire game

SkillTable_Clean.json.EnglishLong: <style="accent-gn">Summon Boss</style>: Phantom Arachnocrab and transforms into a cocoon. Following a brief delay, the cocoon bursts, dealing <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> and <linktext=3000><style="ItemQuality_5">disrupting</style></linktext> the actions of the affected target. Your <style="accent-gn">Mastery</style> is increased for a period.

Summon Elite: Great Warhog to release a Lightning Orb forward, dealing Attack Damage.
Upon the skill cast, your Light Bonus is increased for a period.

<style="accent-gn">Summon Boss</style>: Iron Fang to deliver AoE <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> to nearby enemies, inflicting a <style="accent-gn">100%</style> <linktext=3004><style="ItemQuality_5">Wound</style></linktext> on all affected targets for <style="accent-gn">15s</style>.

<style="accent-gn">Summon Boss</style>: Celestial Flier to charge forward, dealing Ice <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> and <linktext=3000><style="ItemQuality_5">disrupting</style></linktext> the targets' actions. After casting, your <style="accent-gn">Haste</style> is increased for a period of time.

Resonate with the power of Boss: Goblin King, summoning 1 to 3 goblins at random to cast skills.
Always summons 1 random goblin from Elite: Goblin Sword and Elite: Goblin Crossbow.
Has a chance to additionally summon 1 Elite: Jungle Goblin Warrior.
Has a chance to additionally summon 1 from Elite: Hurricane Goblin Giant Axe or Boss: Wind Goblin King. Has a 30% chance to summon the Boss.

Summon Elite Muku Vanguard to charge forward, dealing Attack Damage.
Upon the skill cast, your Thunder Bonus is increased for a period.

BuffTable_Clean.json.EnglishLong: Continuously lose 0.05% of Max HP per second

SkillTable_Clean.json.EnglishLong: After use, dash forward. Go forward bravely!

BuffTable_Clean.json.EnglishLong: Surrounded by a strong wind field, continuously dealing AOE damage.
